biography:
​Guy Penrod is a gospel music singer, who is mostly known for his work as the lead singer of the Gaither Vocal Band, together with his appearances with Bill Gaither and friends both live and on DVD.  He has recently started a solo career.

He was born in  Abilene, Texas on 2 July 1963.  He is a graduate of Liberty University. He has worked as a studio singer for artists like Carman, Steve Green, Amy Grant, Michael W. Smith, Garth Brooks, James Ingram, and Phillips, Craig & Dean.
name: Guy Penrod
